casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Sabo, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Sabo (1996), 76 Ohio St.3d 71.]

(No. 96-661 — Submitted May 21, 1996 — Decided July 17, 1996.) *72William, R. Biddlestone, Athens County Prosecuting Attorney, and Birgit Pedersen, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Larry Sabo, pro se. Per Curiam.

We affirm the judgment of the court of appeals for the reasons set forth in its decision and judgment entry.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Stratton, JJ., concur.
